statements: DELETE FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE supplier_name = 'Eco Friendly Supplies';
DELETE FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM suppliers_ethical_practices WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Corp.' AND compliance_level = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1001 AND company_name = 'Supplier XYZ';
DELETE FROM supply_chain WHERE chain_id IN (SELECT chain_id FROM supply_chain WHERE production_location = 'Factory A') AND supplier_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM supplier_reviews WHERE review_id = 200 AND supplier_id = 1002;
DELETE FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 5 AND stock_quantity < 10;
